summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCeraVe Skin Renewing Night Cream with peptides and ceramides hydrates, replenishes the skin barrier and helps renew the skin overnight.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin-softening night cream formulaHelps reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles while supporting skin elasticityImproves the appearance of tired skin overnight with biomimetic peptidesNon-irritating, non-greasy, intensely hydrating anti aging face moisturizer formulaHelps restore the protective skin barrier with ceramidesHelps attract moisture to the skin with hyaluronic acidHelps soothe the skin with niacinamideNon-comedogenicDeveloped with dermatologistsKey IngredientsBiomimetic peptides improve the appearance of tired-looking skinCeramides help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrierHyaluronic acid attracts hydration to the skin's surface and helps skin retain moistureNiacinamide helps calm the skinMVE Technology, a patented delivery system, continually releases moisturizing ingredientsFormulated WithoutFragranceItem 2283862How To UseApply this night cream in small dots where needed around the face and gently smooth until thoroughly absorbed.Use nightly before bedtime to help soften and renew the look of tired skin overnight.IngredientsPurified Water, Glycerin, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Stearic Acid, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Saccharide Isomerate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Ceramide 6 II, Ceramide 3, Ceramide 1, Niacinamide, Hyaluronic Acid, Caprooyl Tetrapeptide-3, Tripeptide-1, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Behentrimonium Methosulphate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopherol, Allantoin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Phytosphingosine, Dextran, Xanthan Gum.
how_to_use: Apply this night cream in small dots where needed around the face and gently smooth until thoroughly absorbed.Use nightly before bedtime to help soften and renew the look of tired skin overnight.

reviews.headline: Love this cream
reviews.comments: It has everything I want. Fragrance free, lightweight, niacinamide & peptide complex. I have roseca and im always looking for products with niacinamide and hyaluronic acid in them. I was using a high end night cream and Cerave is soooooo much better!!!

reviews.headline: Buy it
reviews.comments: I've been using this cream for 2 or 3 years now and my skin loves it. Its thicker than other face creams and feels luxurious. I have skin allergies to fragrance and shellac and this is free of both those ingredients.  My skin looks so hydrated and revitalized in the morning when I use it.

reviews.headline: Very Good
reviews.comments: Very good product and i have been using it at night for many years. I like the price compared to lots of other products. Its creamy and a little goes a long and it also has ceramides.

reviews.headline: works for me
reviews.comments:
I use this at night and during the day I use the lightweight gel moisturizer. that combo has really turned my dry diabetic facial skin back to what I remember it feeling like 15-20 years ago. I'm really happy with that result. 

it's a little thick especially for someone with sensory issues like me, so a little goes a very long way but it's overall very nice to use.

reviews.headline: Traded in from my more $ night cream
reviews.comments: I had been using a more expensive night cream, but wanted to give this a try when I started to use a Retinol serum. I love a thick moisturizer and this is THICK, more like a paste, really. I love that I can feel it on my face in the morning.

reviews.headline: My FAVE
reviews.comments: This is my #1 face cream. I have average to dry skin with an oily nose. This immediately relieves the dryness and doesnt make my oily area worse. When i wake up in the morning my face is SO soft. I live somewhere hot so i actually use this occasionally during the day as well to keep my skin from freaking out.

reviews.headline: I LOVE it for the skin barriers protection
reviews.comments:
I recommend it if you have: dry, sensitive skin. 

I have super dry sensitive skin. Alot of products that say for sensitive skin still end up giving me rashes or burning me. I can 100% say this is for sensitive skin. 

I used it as intended. I do like it as night cream. I feel it did proctect my skin barrier, but i do feel my skin needs something a little more hydrating. So i wear another moisturizer on top.  I do like it for the daytime because i feel i can wear makeup over it. 

Why i love it. 
I get heat rashes on my face whenever i come in contact with heat or the sun. I get little bumps all over my face and I turn red. Well i started wearing this as my daily moisturizer during the day and it turns out the barrier protection in this product is amazing. Whenever i wear this product during the day i do not breakout in rashes even if i am in the sun. I finally have smooth skin bc of this cream. 
This cream has truly improved my skincare, my makeup and the look of my skin. I love it!!

reviews.headline: only ok
reviews.comments: kind of thick and expensive for what it is. it didn't work on my dry patches around my chin. I prefer regular old vanicream.

reviews.headline: Best Night Cream I have used!
reviews.comments: This is one of the best night creams I have used and the price is definitely great! I will be buying this cream again.  I can see a difference in my skin and have only used it for one week.

reviews.headline: Very Nice night cream
reviews.comments: I use this with the CeraVe  resurfacing retinol serum for acne prone skin.  I have oily skin, but not acne.  This combo is working wonderful for me. The cream is rich and thick, but absorbs well.  No greasy feel.

reviews.headline: Skincare staple
reviews.comments: Cerave is one of the only brands I trust since I experienced eczema on my face a few years ago. I am getting older so I wanted to change my skincare regimen. Cerave night cream is officially my go to product sensitive enough for my sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Great value
reviews.comments: I have rosacea so Im very careful about what I put on my skin. I really like this cream. It doesnt irritate my skin at all.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Immediate results within 3 nights of using.

reviews.headline: Favorite part of my night time routine
reviews.comments: I loveeee this face cream. It is super thick which some may not like but I personally think it feels luxurious. I put it on right before going to sleep and it makes my skin so smooth and hydrated. Will continue buying!

reviews.headline: Dull skin
reviews.comments: I'm a big Cerave fan but this particular product is the first to disappoint. The consistency is thick and mostly sits on top of your skin, and makes skin look dull (when it's not normally).

reviews.headline: Perfection
reviews.comments: This gives a wonderful softness as well as perfect moisture to the skin.

reviews.headline: Reputable brand
reviews.comments: I have only been using this night cream for about a week, but I do like the feel of it. CeraVe is a reputable company and their products are effective. I like that his cream has peptides which help build collagen in the skin. The cream also has hyaluronic acid for moisturizing and ceramides which protect the skin's natural barrier. My skin does feel moisturized when I apply this product.

reviews.headline: worth the money !
reviews.comments: switched from clarins and never going back.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Heavy night cream if you are looking for a heavy moisturizer. I still feel it on my face in yhe morning. I alternate with another heavy cream- but this is a favorite.

reviews.headline: disappointed
reviews.comments: I usually love this brand of products. this is my first time trying the night cream + first off it is a very small amount for the price but my biggest complaint is the smell. it stinks. Not the smell I want to have before going to bed and sitting on my face all night

media.headline: This Product Has Saved My Sanity!

media.headline: CAUSED HORRIBLE BREAK OUT AND CYSTIC ACNE

media.headline: Renewed skin every morning!
media.caption: I am 39yrs old and suffer from eye-bags and dark spots under my eyes, and on this picture I recently had woken up and my skin looks amazing. I barely wear make-up and you can see how my skin glows.

media.headline: Renewed skin every morning!
media.caption: This picture was on Thanksgiving 2021. I hope you can appreciate the smooth look on my skin and how hydrated it looks.

media.headline: Will report back in a month ?

media.headline: Love this product BUT....
media.caption: Hardly any product in the jar

faceoff_positive.comments: I honestly just found this product in the medicine cabinet and thought it was for the face.. I've been dealing with severe acne on the sides of my face for a month already. It said overnight cream so I washed my face with warm to hot water and applied the product before I went to bed. The product just glides on your face I love it. The smell is weird in the container but you don't smell it on your face. Anyways, when I woke up my acne looked incredible. When I break out the acne gets so red, when I woke up I saw little to no redness. I was so shocked to google what this product is, apparently it's for wrinkles and etc but I am not lying IT DID WONDERS FOR MY ACNE !
faceoff_positive.headline: I was surprised (in a good way)

faceoff_negative.comments: At first I thought it was used and returned but after seeing several reviews saying the same thing, I am deeply disappointed and feel cheated out of my hard earned money. We don't want your robotic, basic answer of settling product. There are several reviews calling your generic bluff about going by weight because people have been getting a different weight each time they buy this product. We want you to show you are hearing our complaints by actually changing something to improve the product & product experience. Jars are not the most hygienic version of product storage, it would be more sanitary as a pump. As skin care experts I imagine you know that so why bother with a jar? Put more product in there or make the packaging better fit the product then I will recommend.
faceoff_negative.headline: Less than 1/2 a jar?
